<title level="1" right="Action">[Point Out](/Actions.aspx?ID=97) <actions string="Single Action" /></title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 472 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Requirements**  A creature is undetected by one or more of your allies but isn’t undetected by you.

</column>

---

You indicate a creature that you can see to one or more allies, gesturing in a direction and describing the distance verbally. That creature is [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22) to your allies, rather than [undetected](/Conditions.aspx?ID=39). This works only for allies who can see you and are in a position where they could potentially detect the target. If your allies can't hear or understand you, they must succeed at a Perception check against the creature's [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) DC or they misunderstand and believe the target is in a different location.

requirement: A creature is undetected by one or more of your allies but isn’t undetected by you.
